headline: AppLovin shares drop 5% premarket after cautious CapitalWatch report
summary: A forensic investigation and fund analysis by CapitalWatch suggest systemic compliance risks and potential financial crimes within AppLovin (APP) Corporation, alleging that primary shareholder Hao Tang and associated networks may have bypassed global AML controls to inject funds from China and Southeast Asia into U.S. capital markets. Shares of AppLovin are down about 5% in premarket trading.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, shar
